subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: There was a French victory in the second stage of the Tour de France, but it came in the form of Thor Hushovd, the Crédit Agricole’s Norwegian sprinter.
snippet: There was a French victory in the second stage of the Tour de France, but it came in the form of Thor Hushovd, the Crédit Agricole’s Norwegian sprinter.
